headline: Revvity to Present at J.P. Morgan Healthcare Conference
summary: WALTHAM, Mass., December 17, 2024--Revvity, Inc. (NYSE: RVTY) will present at the 43rd annual J.P. Morgan Healthcare Conference on Monday, January 13, 2025 at 8:15 a.m. PT in San Francisco, CA.
